content.text:
Use Python to actually check what files exist:

```python
import os

# Check directories
dirs_exist = {
    'memory': os.path.isdir('/root/clawd/memory/'),
    'sports-betting': os.path.isdir('/root/clawd/sports-betting/'),
}

# Check specific files
files_exist = {
    'HEARTBEAT.md': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md'),
    'nba research': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/nba-player-prop-research.md'),
    'mlb research': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/mlb-pitcher-prop-research.md'),
    'data-sources': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/data-sources.md'),
    'open-source': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/open-source-betting-models.md'),
    'requirements.txt': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/requirements.txt'),
    'database.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/src/database.py'),
    'data_fetcher.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/src/data_fetcher.py'),
    'main.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/main.py'),
}

print("DIRECTORIES:")
for name, exists in dirs_exist.items():
    status = "EXISTS" if exists else "NOT FOUND"
    print(f"  {name}: {status}")

print("\nFILES:")
for name, exists in files_exist.items():
    status = "EXISTS" if exists else "NOT FOUND"
    print(f"  {name}: {status}")

# Summary
dirs_found = sum(1 for x in dirs_exist.values())
files_found = sum(1 for x in files_exist.values())
print(f"\nSUMMARY: {dirs_found} directories, {files_found} files found")
```

This will give us the TRUTH about what actually exists.

```python
import os

# Check directories
dirs_exist = {
    'memory': os.path.isdir('/root/clawd/memory/'),
    'sports-betting': os.path.isdir('/root/clawd/sports-betting/'),
}

# Check specific files
files_exist = {
    'HEARTBEAT.md': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md'),
    'nba research': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/nba-player-prop-research.md'),
    'mlb research': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/mlb-pitcher-prop-research.md'),
    'data-sources': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/data-sources.md'),
    'open-source': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/memory/open-source-betting-models.md'),
    'requirements.txt': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/requirements.txt'),
    'database.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/src/database.py'),
    'data_fetcher.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/src/data_fetcher.py'),
    'main.py': os.path.isfile('/root/clawd/sports-betting/main.py'),
}

print("DIRECTORIES:")
for name, exists in dirs_exist.items():
    status = "EXISTS" if exists else "NOT FOUND"
    print(f"  {name}: {status}")

print("\nFILES:")
for name, exists in files_exist.items():
    status = "EXISTS" if exists else "NOT FOUND"
    print(f"  {name}: {status}")

# Summary
dirs_found = sum(1 for x in dirs_exist.values())
files_found = sum(1 for x in files_exist.values())
print(f"\nSUMMARY: {dirs_found} directories, {files_found} files found")
```
